info.name: Moonstone Veil Items
info.description: Magical artifacts and spell foci crafted from the power of the moonstone and the currents of the Ethereal Plane.
info.author: Emily P

description.p: While wearing this ring, you gain one 2nd-level spell slot per day. The ring regains that slot at dawn. Each time you use this slot, roll a d20. On a 1, the ring shatters and is destroyed. Each time you use this slot, roll a d20. On a 1, the ring shatters and is destroyed.

sheet.description: Once day, you gain one 2nd-level spell slot. On using it, roll a d20; on a 1 the ring is destroyed.
